00014 int main (int argc, char const *argv[])
00015 {
00016     try
00017     {
00018         Image image( argv[1] );
00019         Recognizer recon( image );
00020         
00021         vector<ClipLocation> c;
00022         c.push_back( ClipLocation(0,    0,  147,    206) );
00023         c.push_back( ClipLocation(147,  0,  147,    206) );
00024         c.push_back( ClipLocation(294,  0,  147,    206) );
00025         
00026         
00027         recon.obtainText(c);
00028         cout << "Background finding time:     " << recon.statistic(0).backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime() << endl;

00031         cout << "Preprocessing time:          " << recon.statistic(0).preprocessingTime() << endl;
00032         cout << endl;
00033         
00034         cout << "Background finding time:     " << recon.statistic(1).backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime() << endl;
00035         cout << "Thresholding computing time: " << recon.statistic(1).optimalThresholdComputingTime() << endl;
00036         cout << "Noise removal time:          " << recon.statistic(1).noiseRemovalTime() << endl;
00037         cout << "Preprocessing time:          " << recon.statistic(1).preprocessingTime() << endl;
00038         cout << endl;
00039         
00040         cout << "Background finding time:     " << recon.statistic(2).backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime() << endl;
00041         cout << "Thresholding computing time: " << recon.statistic(2).optimalThresholdComputingTime() << endl;
00042         cout << "Noise removal time:          " << recon.statistic(2).noiseRemovalTime() << endl;
00043         cout << "Preprocessing time:          " << recon.statistic(2).preprocessingTime() << endl;
00044         cout << endl;
00045

00047         image.write("results.png");
